title: Terminating with uncaught exception of type NSException
body:
I am trying to calculate the mAP of a yolo model (darkflow). I added the images to the `images` directory, the predictions to the `predicted` directory and the ground truth annotations to the `ground-truth` directory. I converted the predictions and ground truth to the required format using the files in the `extra` folder. However, when I run `python main.py,` after calculating the mAP, the kernel crashes with an error saying "`libc++abi.dylib: terminating with uncaught exception of type NSException`". Here is the full error:

```
unrecognized selector sent to instance 0x7fb7a5f84cc0
2019-03-10 14:02:24.062 python[18003:11286498] *** Terminating app due to uncaught exception 'NSInvalidArgumentException', reason: '-[QNSApplication _setup:]: unrecognized selector sent to instance 0x7fb7a5f84cc0'
*** First throw call stack:
(
	0   CoreFoundation                      0x00007fff4ed7dded __exceptionPreprocess + 256

	19  python                              0x0000000100fc2137 _PyObject_FastCallKeywords + 327
	20  python                              0x0000000101110718 call_function + 392
	21  python                              0x000000010110e225 _PyEval_EvalFrameDefault + 47013

	34  python                              0x000000010110e175 _PyEval_EvalFrameDefault + 46837
	35  python                              0x00000001011109dc fast_function + 188
	36  python                              0x000000010111067c call_function + 236
	37  python                              0x000000010110e175 _PyEval_EvalFrameDefault + 46837

libc++abi.dylib: terminating with uncaught exception of type NSException
Abort trap: 6
```


How do I avoid this?
